name: Quaternion War!
description:
Quaternion War! is a twin-stick shooter set on a small, round planet. To win you have to destroy the five energy crystals scattered across the planet. If you take three hits, you lose. Gamepad recommended!

Originally made for Ludum Dare 38.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse/Arrows - Turn
  • Mouse 1/Space - Fire

Gamepad controls

  • Left stick - Move
  • Right stick - Turn
  • Right bumper - Fire

Backspace or Start to quit
